search.general: iART supports image-oriented research processes in the humanities with the aid of machine learning. You can either search for similar objects with text ...
search.image: ... or by uploading a reference image, e.g., from your computer.
search.random: It is also possible to display results for a randomly selected reference image.

filter.general: Using a faceted search, the list of results can be further narrowed down.
filter.period: Objects can be filtered based on their metadata, e.g., by their date of origin.

settings.general: iART is flexibly configurable and adapts to your research interests.
settings.weights: You can change weighting of plug-ins and thus adjust the order of results.
settings.layout: Different result views are available: from ranked lists to 2D canvas visualizations.
settings.cluster: Results can be clustered with various algorithms and visualized, e.g., as image carousels.

cluster.1d: For each cluster, the number of objects assigned to it is specified. In addition, tags that best describe it are displayed.
cluster.2d: Cluster memberships are indicated by colored dots. Press and hold the right mouse button to select multiple objects.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.text: We are using cookies to help with the basic functionality of our website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

file.label: Select Image File
file.rule: File size should be less than {n} MB.

noresults.title: Information
noresults.text: Your search did not yield any results. Please modify your query or extend the range of your search, e. g., by removing filters.

detail.not_authenticated: You could not be authenticated. If this message continues to appear, try again later or contact support.
detail.unknown_user: Please check your credentials. If this message continues to appear, try again later or contact support.
detail.username_not_provided: Please check your credentials. If this message continues to appear, try again later or contact support.
detail.password_not_provided: Please check your credentials. If this message continues to appear, try again later or contact support.
detail.email_not_provided: Please check your credentials. If this message continues to appear, try again later or contact support.
detail.username_already_taken: This username is already in use. Please try another one.
detail.collection_name_too_short: The specified collection name is too short.
detail.collection_name_too_long: The specified collection name is too long.
detail.no_images: Please upload an archive file with at least one image.
detail.no_valid_colnames: No valid column names could be found in the given metadata file.
detail.corrupt_archives_file: The given archive file is corrupt and could not be read.
detail.no_matching_images: Metadata could not be mapped to given image files.
detail.unknown_error: An error has occurred while processing your request. Please try again later or contact support.
detail.search: An error has occurred while processing your search. Please try again later or contact support.
detail.upload: An error has occurred while processing your upload. Please try again later or contact support.
